1aeb164a-07ac-4849-b505-6dc98a5d26e0: Grants +100% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} until the next critical hit is scored.
24ecb65f-7ebd-4112-8f52-89a8fdc20c1b: Any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the character is increased by 10%.
2cd17b1f-d498-45fe-bf3a-d62e4ffb213d:
The Rogue Trader and their allies gain a +10% chance to survive with 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} instead of falling {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Follower -//
467027e3-8699-44aa-a92e-9618eba5e7e8:
The Rogue Trader and their allies need 30 less {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} to activate a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary -//
5fcf1919-644b-48e7-b13f-263034b75cde:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} increase the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the Rogue Trader's party by +<u>(2 to 10)</u> instead of decreasing it by −<u>(1 to 5)</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary -//
63fbd4b3-6fc0-4c5a-9d2c-d540cd6c525b: Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all Lore {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} — Warp, Xenos, and Imperium, and +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
645fb471-37c3-48ce-b5cd-f9d6c113c98a:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} expenditure by the Rogue Trader and their allies, including {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, is reduced by −20%.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary -//
682c64da-175f-45d1-a587-bbf6a49fd2ac: Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} against xenos and daemons.
c8a39016-7ef1-41d8-bc3f-85fc853e5639:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of every combat, the Rogue Trader and their allies gain +<u>(2 + Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} rank)</u> additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.{br}
///Iconoclast — Adherent -//
ddccd597-47f1-4b34-857e-945ea06f2df8:
The Rogue Trader and two random allies start combat with temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to <u>(their own {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g})</u>.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower -//
ec6592f8-0aa2-47cd-b955-afda8b5c212c:
The Rogue Trader and their allies gain a +20% chance to save a combat stimulant or a medikit after using it.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Follower -//
